Name: Brandy Fizz
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Soda from siphon
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (without ice). TOP with soda.
Review: A refreshing and tasty dry drink: cognac and lemon balanced with a little sugar and lengthened with soda.
Nutrition: One serving of Brandy Fizz contains 162 calories
